name: Big League Sports: Summer Sports
description:
Enjoy all of your favorite summers sports at the Pro Center, where Coach will guide you through intense drills to test your athletic skills. Push yourself to the max as you compete against your rivals to become the ultimate Sports Champion!

Features

• Play 6 of Summer's hottest sports - beach vollyball, tennis, baseball, football, soccer and golf
• Test your athletic skills with a range of All-Star challenges, including home run derby, hotbox, corner kicks, golf target drive and many more
• In single player mode, you are a sports prospect receiving training at the world-renown Pro Center. Receive guidance from the sage Coach and hone your athletic prowess on court, field, course, sand and diamond
• In multi-player mode, compete against others in a variety of drills and exercises in intense simultaneous gameplay
